original_text:
Ice Ice Yeti
Dirigetevi verso un deserto ghiacciato dove una banda di sfacciate creature chiamate Rascals chiamano casa in Ice Ice Ice Yeti, uno slot a 5 rulli da Nolimit City. Cercate i simboli speciali che possono sbloccare le bobine congelate per offrire fino a 16.807 modi di vincere, oltre alle striature. Gioca a questo gioco volatile sul tuo PC, tablet o cellulare da 0,10€ a 100€ a giro.
Una grafica congelata
Entra in una serena scena invernale nella regione artica su Ice Ice Yeti, dove quattro amici pelosi si aggirano nella natura selvaggia alla ricerca del gigante Yeti. Un’inedita finestra di gioco a 5 rulli, che si espande da cinque file e 243 vie a un enorme sette file e 16.807 vie, offre ampio spazio per le loro avventure. Una volta trovato Yeti, inizierà l’espansione e premierà le vittorie che superano di gran lunga i 5.000x la vostra scommessa.
Nolimit City è uno studio di gioco con sede a Stoccolma, in Svezia. Dal 2013, intrattiene i giocatori di slot con emozionanti slot con colpi di scena inusuali e meccaniche di pagamento. Il fornitore relativamente piccolo ma altamente innovativo e creativo ha la missione di portare il gioco online ad un livello superiore.
Siete mai stati fuori un giorno dopo una notte di neve pesante, con le nuvole che hanno liberato il cielo e dato quella sensazione di aria fresca e pulita e di serena bellezza bianca? Senza dubbio, questo è uno dei momenti più panoramici che possiamo vivere in inverno. Nolimit City ha preso questo scenario per lo sfondo di Ice Ice Yeti, con i banchi di neve fresca costruiti sulla gigantesca finestra di gioco a sette file. Le due file in alto e in basso sono ricoperte da blocchi di ghiaccio trasparenti che si romperanno per aprire più posizioni di bobina, sia tramite la funzione casuale che la funzione bonus sulla slot. Una colonna sonora accattivante con uccelli cinguettanti è interrotta solo dal consueto stop del mulinello e dai rumori di conteggio delle vincite.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Noterete che ci sono 2 file sopra e 2 file sotto il set di mulinello principale che sono congelate. Queste possono scongelarsi nelle 2 caratteristiche offerte in Ice Ice Ice Yeti:
Funzione Yeti Shake – in qualsiasi rotazione, lo Yeti animato può apparire per dare una buona scossa alle bobine. Tra 2 e 10 delle posizioni delle bobine congelate si scongelano per creare un’area di gioco più grande. Se le bobine raggiungono la loro configurazione massima e tutte le posizioni congelate vengono scongelate, si giocherà su bobine che offrono 16.807 modi per vincere.
Funzione Ice Ice Respins – atterra uno Yeti wild e ti verrà assegnato un respin con 2 o 3 posizioni congelate sbloccate. Potreste anche atterrare un simbolo appiccicoso. Questi sono orlati con il bagliore blu. Questo fa scattare una vena di respin. Questi respin continuano ad arrivare fino a quando un nuovo simbolo corrispondente o wild si unisce al gruppo vincente originale.
Ice Ice Yeti è una slot piuttosto semplice. La grafica è molto ben fatta, così come la sbarazzina traccia di supporto. Il gioco non è sovraccarico di extra, ma sbloccare le posizioni delle bobine congelate può davvero aprire le cose.
Il design qui potrebbe essere sul lato carino e coccoloso, ma questo è uno slot molto volatile. Aspettatevi incantesimi in cui il vostro bankroll sembrerà congelare. Aprendo le bobine e facendo una corsa con i respins si può ottenere un po ‘di azione piuttosto fresco però – fino a 8.820 volte la tua puntata su ogni spin/respin!
Ice Ice Yeti è una video slot con cinque rulli, tre file e 243 modi per vincere. La finestra di gioco può espandersi in modo casuale o durante la funzione respin fino a sette file e 16.807 vittorie. Le caratteristiche del gioco sono lo Yeti Shake e Ice Ice Ice Respins. L’RTP di questo gioco di media grandezza è impostato al 96,16%.
Fedele alla missione del fornitore del gioco, lo slot è progettato nel moderno formato HTML5, rendendolo disponibile per il gioco su desktop, mobile e tablet su tutte le piattaforme del sistema operativo. L’AutoPlay permette ai giocatori di scegliere da 10 a 100 giri da giocare consecutivamente, con una serie di opzioni su quando la corsa dovrebbe fermarsi.
Unirsi ai quattro amici pelosi nei loro tour in roaming costerà da 0,10 a 50 monete. Paga per un singolo cinque di una gamma da 0,50 a 2,50x la puntata iniziale. La vincita massima in una singola sequenza di respin supera i 5.000x la puntata.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Se vi piace un’ambientazione congelata, si consiglia Lucky Angler di NetEnt. Ambientato in un lago sottomarino ghiacciato, ha una caratteristica Sticky Wild nel gioco base dove gli sticky wild rimangono congelati sui rulli finché si hanno combinazioni vincenti.

raw_translation.response:
Ice Ice Yeti:
Head to a frozen desert where a group of bold creatures called Rascals call home in Ice Ice Yeti, a 5-reel slot game from Nolimit City. Look for special symbols that can unlock frozen reels to offer up to 16,807 ways to win, in addition to streaks. Play this volatile game on your PC, tablet or mobile for €0.10 to €100 per spin.
Frozen Graphics:
Step into a serene winter scene in the arctic region in Ice Ice Yeti, where four furry friends roam in the wild looking for the giant Yeti. An innovative 5-reel game window, which expands from five rows and 243 ways to a huge seven rows and 16,807 ways, offers ample space for their adventures. Once Yeti is found, the expansion starts and awards wins that far exceed 5,000x your bet.
Nolimit City is a gaming studio based in Stockholm, Sweden. Since 2013, it has entertained slot players with exciting slots with unusual twists and payment mechanics. The relatively small but highly innovative and creative provider is on a mission to take online gaming to the next level.
Have you ever been out on a day after a heavy snowfall, with clouds that have cleared the sky and given that feeling of fresh, clean air and serene white beauty? Undoubtedly, this is one of the most panoramic moments we can experience in winter. Nolimit City has taken this scenario for the background of Ice Ice Yeti, with fresh snow banks built on the giant seven-row game window. The top and bottom two rows are covered with transparent ice blocks that will break to open more reel positions, both through the random feature and the bonus feature on the slot. A catchy soundtrack with chirping birds is interrupted only by the usual reel stop and win counting noises.
Slot Machine Functions and Symbols:
You will notice that there are 2 rows above and 2 rows below the main reel set that are frozen. These can thaw in the 2 features offered in Ice Ice Yeti:
Yeti Shake Feature - In any rotation, the animated Yeti may appear to give the reels a good shake. Between 2 and 10 of the frozen reel positions will thaw to create a larger playing area. If the reels reach their maximum configuration and all frozen positions are thawed, you will play on reels that offer 16,807 ways to win.
Ice Ice Respins Feature - Land one wild Yeti and you will be awarded a respin with 2 or 3 thawed reel positions. You may also land a sticky symbol. These are lined with blue glow. This triggers a vein of respins. These respins keep coming until a new matching or wild symbol joins the original winning group.
Ice Ice Yeti is a pretty simple slot. The graphics are very well done, as is the playful supporting track. The game is not overloaded with extras, but unlocking the frozen reel positions can really open things up.
The design here may be on the cute and cuddly side, but this is a highly volatile slot. Expect spells where your bankroll will seem frozen. Unlocking reels and going on a run with respins can get some pretty cool action though - up to 8,820 times your stake on every spin/respin!
Ice Ice Yeti is a video slot with five reels, three rows, and 243 ways to win. The game window can expand at random or during the respin feature to seven rows and 16,807 wins. The game features are Yeti Shake and Ice Ice Ice Respins. The RTP of this medium-sized game is set at 96.16%.
True to the game provider's mission, the slot is designed in the modern HTML5 format, making it available for play on desktop, mobile, and tablet on all operating system platforms. Autoplay allows players to choose from 10 to 100 consecutive spins to play, with a range of options on when the run should stop.
Join the four furry friends on their roaming tours for 0.10 to 50 coins. Pay for a single five of a range from 0.50 to 2.50x the initial bet. The maximum win in a single respin sequence exceeds 5,000x the bet.
Similar Slot Machines:
If you like a frozen setting, Lucky Angler from NetEnt is recommended. Set in a frozen underwater lake, it has a Sticky Wild feature in the base game where the sticky wilds remain frozen on the reels until you have winning combinations.

Take a trip to the frozen desert where a group of brazen creatures called Rascals call home in Ice Ice Yeti, a 5-reel slot from Nolimit City. Look for the special symbols that can unlock frozen reels to offer up to 16,807 ways to win, in addition to streaks. Play this volatile game on your PC, tablet, or mobile for €0.10 to €100 per spin.

Frozen Graphics
Enter a serene winter scene in the Arctic region on Ice Ice Yeti, where four furry friends roam the wilderness on the search for the giant Yeti. An unprecedented 5-reel game window, expanding from five rows and 243 ways to an enormous seven rows and 16,807 ways, offers ample space for their adventures. Once Yeti is found, expansion begins and rewards winnings that exceed 5,000x your bet.

Nolimit City is a gaming studio based in Stockholm, Sweden. Since 2013, it has entertained slot players with exciting slots with unusual twists and payment mechanics. The small but highly innovative and creative provider has a mission to take online gaming to the next level.

Have you ever been out one day after a heavy snowfall, with clouds that have released the sky and given that feeling of fresh and clean air and serene white beauty? Undoubtedly, this is one of the most panoramic moments we can experience in winter. Nolimit City took this scenario for the background of Ice Ice Yeti, with fresh snow banks built on the giant seven-row game window. The two top and bottom rows are covered in transparent ice blocks that will break open more reel positions, either through the random function or the bonus feature on the slot. An engaging soundtrack with chirping birds is interrupted only by the usual reel stop and win count noises.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols
You'll notice that there are 2 rows above and 2 rows below the main reel set that are frozen. These can thaw in the 2 features offered in Ice Ice Ice Yeti:

Yeti Shake Function – in any rotation, the animated Yeti may appear to give the reels a good shake. Between 2 and 10 of the frozen reel positions thaw to create a larger gameplay area. If the reels reach their maximum configuration and all frozen positions thaw, you’ll play on reels that offer 16,807 ways to win.

Ice Ice Respins Feature – land a wild Yeti and you'll be awarded a respin with 2 or 3 unlocked frozen positions. You may also land a sticky symbol. These are bordered with a blue glow. This triggers a vein of respins. These respins keep coming until a new matching or wild symbol joins the original winning group.

Ice Ice Yeti is a rather simple slot. The graphics are very well done, as is the playful supporting track. The game is not overloaded with extras, but unlocking frozen reel positions can really open things up.

The design here could be on the cute and cuddly side, but this is a very volatile slot. Expect spells where your bankroll will seem frozen. Opening the reels and taking a run with the respins can get you some pretty cool action though – up to 8,820 times your bet on each spin/respin!

True to the game provider's mission, the slot is designed in the modern HTML5 format, making it available for play on desktop, mobile, and tablet on all operating system platforms. AutoPlay allows players to choose from 10 to 100 spins to play consecutively, with a range of options on when the run should stop.

Join the four furry friends on their roaming tours for a cost of 0.10 to 50 coins. Pay for a single five of a range from 0.50 to 2.50x the initial bet. The maximum win on a single respin sequence exceeds 5,000x the bet.

Similar Slot Machines
If you like a frozen environment, we recommend NetEnt's Lucky Angler. Set in a frozen underwater lake, it has a Sticky Wild feature in the base game where the sticky wilds remain frozen on the reels until you have winning combinations.

Undoubtedly, this is one of the most panoramic moments we can experience in winter. Nolimit City took this scenario for the background of Ice Ice Yeti, with fresh snow banks built on the giant seven-row game window. The two top and bottom rows are covered in transparent ice blocks that will break open more reel positions, either through the random function or the bonus feature on the slot. An engaging soundtrack with chirping birds is interrupted only by the usual reel stop and win count noises.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols
You'll notice that there are 2 rows above and 2 rows below the main reel set that are frozen. These can thaw in the 2 features offered in Ice Ice Ice Yeti:

Yeti Shake Function – in any rotation, the animated Yeti may appear to give the reels a good shake. Between 2 and 10 of the frozen reel positions thaw to create a larger gameplay area. If the reels reach their maximum configuration and all frozen positions thaw, you’ll play on reels that offer 16,807 ways to win.

Ice Ice Respins Feature – land a wild Yeti and you'll be awarded a respin with 2 or 3 unlocked frozen positions. You may also land a sticky symbol. These are bordered with a blue glow. This triggers a vein of respins. These respins keep coming until a new matching or wild symbol joins the original winning group.

Ice Ice Yeti is a rather simple slot. The graphics are very well done, as is the playful supporting track. The game is not overloaded with extras, but unlocking frozen reel positions can really open things up.

The design here could be on the cute and cuddly side, but this is a very volatile slot. Expect spells where your bankroll will seem frozen. Opening the reels and taking a run with the respins can get you some pretty cool action though – up to 8,820 times your bet on each spin/respin!

Ice Ice Yeti is a video slot with five reels, three rows, and 243 ways to win. The game window can randomly expand or during the respin feature up to seven rows and 16,807 wins. The game features are Yeti Shake and Ice Ice Ice Respins. The RTP of this medium-sized game is set at 96.16%.

True to the game provider's mission, the slot is designed in the modern HTML5 format, making it available for play on desktop, mobile, and tablet on all operating system platforms. AutoPlay allows players to choose from 10 to 100 spins to play consecutively, with a range of options on when the run should stop.

Join the four furry friends on their roaming tours for a cost of 0.10 to 50 coins. Pay for a single five of a range from 0.50 to 2.50x the initial bet. The maximum win on a single respin sequence exceeds 5,000x the bet.

Similar Slot Machines
If you like a frozen environment, we recommend NetEnt's Lucky Angler. Set in a frozen underwater lake, it has a Sticky Wild feature in the base game where the sticky wilds remain frozen on the reels until you have winning combinations.
